ref.mixed-citation: Moss RH, Schneider SH. Uncertainties in the IPCC TAR: Recommendations to lead authors for more consistent assessment and reporting. In: Guidance Papers on the Cross Cutting Issues of the Third Assessment Report of the IPCC (eds.) Pachauri R, Taniguchi T and Tanaka K. 2000; Geneva: World Meteorological Organization, pp. 33-51.
